body: Plenty of other people make "kys" jokes but don't get banned, they cuss at people, don't get muted, but I say," Kys xD gf" and get banned. Obvious joke

replies.body: There shouldn't be jokes about telling others to kill themselves. Some people can't differentiate between joke and real threat. And there should be an punishment, even if it was a joke, so people learn it's not a joke..
replies.body_tagged: There shouldn't be jokes about telling others to kill themselves. Some people can't differentiate between joke and real threat. And there should be an punishment, even if it was a joke, so people learn it's not a joke..

replies.body: People should be able to differentiate between a joke and an actual threat. In this case, it was obviously a joke, and although I don't agree with people saying this, at the end of the day it is only three letters, and I think it is a bit harsh to ban someone just for saying it. Especially when it is in a joking context. Anyways, just my opinion.

replies.body:
*sigh*
In the past as a moderator on different servers, when people would say "Everyone else does it, why do I only get banned"
Well the answer is...
Don't get caught.
You should know it's against the rules, and if you're going to pull, "well he did it too and didn't get punished" probably means that he didn't get caught.
What you learnt from this experience?
Either don't get caught or just don't do it (Better choice).
replies.body_tagged:
*sigh*

replies.body:
That's a bad system.

(Player 1)- kys faggot (let's just say he meant it)

(Staff 1)- Player 1, was that a joke or did you mean it?

(Player 1)- Of course I didn't mean it! It was a joke. 

People would get away very easily. Staff should ban accordingly, even if it is a joke, or even if you say it to a good friend. You just shouldn't say it, end of story. It's retarded as fuck to tell someone to jump off a bridge over a block game.

My opinion is that a ban on 1-2 weeks is the best way. People who say it as a joke need to learn that it's not something you joke about (as Rese said) and lots of people have problems with be nice on internet that need to learn how to be respectfull and nice. If they get tempbanned for have been rude/mean on any way they can just blame themselves.

There's also better ways to tell people that you got mad on them on the funny way, use that instead. =)

replies.body: Some players need to learn a lesson and their lesson is to have a 2 week break off the server (if first offense), so they can at least have time to learn from their mistake.  We don't need players going around encouraging suicide to people, jokingly or not since it does effect some people.

replies.body:
Mute commands are stupid.

Muting cuts off communication between players and staff. Communication should be encouraged, not suppressed. And if there is a player saying things worthy of a mute, they probably don't belong on the server anyways and can be dealt with using tempbans and kicks.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Alright, so let me get this straight.

Somehow, the people that disagree with you because you have been encouraging suicide two times now and have had a ban for excessive infractions are part of a bad community? I'm sorry, but are you fucking serious? This pissed me off so much, you can just add that "triggered" template below me and shake it harder than DGB's "Best server ever" videos. 

If anything, you're what makes people think the community is bad. Accept that you shouldn't have said "kys" in the first place, appeal and move on.

One thing though, please add a mute command for any Staff reading this, would make life so much easier. I wouldn't have one quarter of my infractions if there was one.

replies.body:
if you get so mad at someone you tell them to kill themselves then you should follow these easy steps to becoming a better man:
step 1: press escape
step 2: press disconnect
step 3: press cancel on your server list
step 4: press quit game
step 5: go outside and do something
youre welcome

replies.body: Insults like these are highly frowned upon, especially directly calling people out. The entire purpose behind this rule is to maintain and have full control over the in-game chat, I'm not sure if you've noticed, but on the servers which do allow such insults, their chat usually gets heavily spammed, filled with rudeness and profanity, and is very aggressive to all the nice users. The point of this game is to have fun and enjoy yourself, if you can't control yourself or your actions, then don't be suprised when you get banned.

replies.body:
Alright, this is my advice to you. From what I see you 100% didn't want to offend anyone and was just caught up in the moment. Sometimes you get angry, and I'm not one to blame you. Just don't say "kys" at all. Before saying anything, just try to think if it is going to offend someone (and then rethink because you know how the Internet is).

https://www.google.ca/search?q=how+to+make+a+joke+with+in+2016&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEw... 

just for the memes

replies.body:
Imo there's no reason for this not to be a warn, then a two week ban, then a permanent ban. If you've done it once then you should know not to do it again. I personally know people who have thought about this and it's honestly really scary to know that at any point you could get a call or text that they are no longer with you. As much as I get it if it's a joke, it still shouldn't be acceptable. If you didn't know it was against the rules then a warn should get the message across that it's not allowed, and if you still don't get it then a two week ban seems perfectly acceptable. If you still don't get it after that then there's no reason to keep you around. All you're doing at that point is being toxic.

Edit: Just to add and maybe answer some questions I might get. I know it sounds insane to kill yourself because someone told you to on the internet, but if you're legitimately on the edge, then that could be what sends you over it. I have a friend who was talking to me one night talking about how he/she was just so done with everything, and suicide came up and he/she stopped responding because she fell asleep. It was one of the most terrifying things ever, considering  this person is one of my best friends. I don't know what I would do without them.

(Also this should be a mature topic, saying the words "killing themselves" or "suicide" shouldn't be hidden, it's part of the topic. It's like when you talk about sex in Science and everyone feels weird say it, it doesn't make sense but either way. There's no reason to use "kts" instead of just saying killed/killing themselves just to avoid it being talked about it.
replies.body_tagged:

I have a friend who was talking to me one night talking about how he/she was just so done with everything, and suicide came up and he/she stopped responding because she fell asleep. It was one of the most terrifying things ever, considering  this person is one of my best friends. I don't know what I would do without them.

(Also this should be a mature topic, saying the words "killing themselves" or "suicide" shouldn't be hidden, it's part of the topic. It's like when you talk about sex in Science and everyone feels weird say it, it doesn't make sense but either way. There's no reason to use "kts" instead of just saying killed/killing themselves just to avoid it being talked about it.

replies.body: No the main problem here is that people on the internet do not know how to differentiate a joke and a none joke and those people should not be on the internet. It may be something not to joke about to you, but others find it as a joke. Seriously, if someone you do NOT know and have NEVER met before is telling YOU to kill yourself on an online game, you should be proud. You don't know this person and they are telling you to end your life? what kind of joke is that. It's something I laugh about. Let me kill myself over a video game.

My opinion is that a ban on 1-2 weeks is the best way. People who say it as a joke need to learn that it's not something you joke about (as Rese said) and lots of people have problems with be nice on internet that need to learn how to be respectfull and nice. If they get tempbanned for have been rude/mean on any way they can just blame themselves.

There's also better ways to tell people that you got mad on them on the funny way, use that instead. =)
